documentation.xhtml: Time it take to open the valve
Time it take to close the valve

Pump simulator will turn on when recieves ON signal and will shutoff when it recieves a OFF signal If SimTrip signal becomes true, pump will trip and cannot be started until signal goes false If SimFilterFail signal becomes true the pump will operate but the flowrate will start to slowly drop until zero
This tells the pump simulation that there is no more medium to pump so the flowmeter drops to 0
Task cycle of the POU this model is running in miliseconds

ST.xhtml: (* This system controls the steam valves to the consumers *) (*Requirements: - Operator needs to be able to open and close any valve on the consumer system - The consumer valves are only in manual mode - The valves need to be open incrementally *)
